tags: None
review:
I am consulting Dr. Nutan from a long time now for my wife's pregnancy's counseling it was first in year 2009 when we came in contact with her first time in Bensups hospital (Visiting Sr. Doctor for Gyane.) the overall experience was enriching with the final delivery of our first child in year 2010. 
After a long time then again we searched for her and came in touch recently for our 2nd pregnancy counseling in 2016 again the timely advice and guidance was beneficial for us with the second delivery of our child again under her supervision.

I would say that she has very hands on and demonstrated experience of handling pregnancy related issues/problems also she is quite good in building the rapport with the patient which is very important for making them comfortable.

We are happy as a couple to reach out to Dr. Nutan.
Thanks Doc!!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: dr nutun is an amazing doctor. she is very pollite,caring,clear and sympathetic to the needs of patient.she clears our every dout about our health issues.she is well experienced.I am satisfied with her treatment and highly recommend doctor for any pregnancy complication , fertility treatment and pregnancy counselling

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Dr Nutan yadav is very friendly and tries to understand patient psychology along with disease. She takes care of all issues related to patience's satisfaction. She handled high risk pregnancy very calmly with proper explanation. I am higlhy satisfied with her treatment.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Dr. Nutan is an amazing doctor. She is very open, clear and sympathetic to the needs of the patient. She was my doctor for the delivery of my first child & the journey couldn't have been better. She was supportive not only to me but also helped my family members understand the changes I was going through. Thank You Doctor for all your support & guidance.

tags: None
review: Wonderful experience with Dr. Nutan . Blessed with second child after 10 years . I am hypothyriod patient and due to that facing problems in conceiving . However, Dr.Nutan gave me advice to reduce weight  and follow healthy lifestyle ... she was very supportive and caring all the time .Even my baby born with some breathing issue .She took charge proactively to send my baby to better NICU which saved my baby. **** ** *** *********

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,
context: Pre-Pregnancy Counselling,Pregnancy Check Up,Child Birth Education,Pre and Post Delivery Care,Maternal Care/ Checkup,
review:
Our friend highly recommended Dr Nutan for consultation on preganancy and delivery and I am happy to share that she is ***** * ************* *** experienced practitioner. She has been a guide, a mentor, an elder, a friend and everything that you can expect from your gynae on your first pregnancy. 

She held us strong and kept us confident throghout and her guidance has helped us to enjoy these crucial and most memorable journey.

Without any complexity, her simple approach helped us to stay focused and relaxed simultaneously. By the time we reached the D day we were confident that we can trust her and rely on her for any last moment decisions.

We can never be less grateful to her and would appreciate and recommend to all parents to be.

Thank you Doctor :-)

tags: None
review: Very bad doctor. Came for abortion she gave some pills but of no use. Ultimately we have to get it removed surgically. That time itself we opted for IUD but that also failed. I dont know how she inserted the IUD but after some time we were left with no choice but to get it removed.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I visited to the doctor for pregnancy checkup for the first time. The doctor is so good and explain everything in very good way and tells everything very clearly till my delivery. I would recommend the doctor as she is the best gynecologist I have ever met.

tags: None
review: Thnx doc for the beautiful gift, Jeeshu.. I thing no need to more words to explain how much I trust u.. I got solution for my every prblm to consult u. Thnx once again.

review: I would highly recommend Dr. Nutan Yadav for Pregnancy check up. She is very friendly and explains everything neatly to the patient. She doesn't prescribe any unnecessary medicines and tests. She always encourage Normal Delivery.

review: *** **** ************ * **** ****..I consulted her for my both the deliveries ,she is a doctor with immense patience ...extremely satisfied with her ********* *** ***** ** ************* although I had fibroids during my first pregnancy however she handled it with such care that I could not realise that there is a complications...highly recommended doctor for your gynecological needs.

review: Visiting this doctor since long time almost 8 years for pre and post delivery care at the time of birth of my both kids. *** ** **** ************* ** ****** *** very well in managing patients in family way. She explains well regarding health issues and warns to maintain health and hygiene to avoid future medical complications. I have referred this doctor to few of my friends as well and they are also quite satisfied.
